title: Beachfront Villa Hideaway in Malaysian Borneo
description: Head off the grid for five nights of secluded tranquillity staying in your very own villa hideaway nestled between the rainforest and a hidden bay at Bungaraya Island Resort, located a short 15-minute boat ride from Kota Kinabalu mainland. Includes return airport boat transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, two ‘Flavours of Malaysia’ dining experience, massages, nightly cocktails, coral replanting excursion, complimentary water sports and more.
offer_address: Polish Bay, Gaya Island, Tunku Abdul Rahman Park, Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia
